selected_quotes: The 3 key PRL papers for today's #NobelPrize are now free to read

Read the SNO paper here: almost 3,000 citations in INSPIRE.

video.title: Skull 1470, Laetoli, and the Neutrino Problem
video.summary:
A video response to ChVdth3mAd's video, seen here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=es41a6AZ2ZY

This video gives a light debunking to some classic Creationist arguments: Skull 1470, the Laetoli footprints, and the famous Neutrino Problem.


Sources (if I mi

wikipedia.title: Neutral particle oscillation
wikipedia.summary: In particle physics, neutral particle oscillation is the transmutation of a particle with zero electric charge into another neutral particle due to a change of a non-zero internal quantum number via an interaction that does not conserve that quantum number

wikipedia.title: Eugene W. Beier
wikipedia.summary: Eugene William Beier (born 30 January 1940 in Harvey, Illinois) is an American physicist.

news.summary: Neutrinos sind nach den Photonen die häufigsten Teilchen im Universum. Sie entstehen beispielsweise, wenn kosmische Strahlung auf die Erdatmosphäre trifft oder bei Kernreaktionen in der Sonne, aber auch auf der Erde in Kernkraftwerken.
